dict.string: InfiniOS: Your device. Your rules InfiniOS is a tweak that allows it's user to customise every aspect of the iOS system. Below is a list of settings currently available which will be constantly updated as I add more options.

Cinema Mode: Messages Dark Mode Disable Text Message: Disable Send as SMS Disable Delete: Disable Delete Button Disable Forward: Disable Forwarding Disable Drawer Layout: Not sure Disable Message Display: Not sure Disable Tail: Remove Tails Disable Editable: Disable Editable Messages
Disable Green: Disable Green Bubbles Disable Blue: Disable Blue Bubbles
Hide Conversation Label: Hide Conversation Preview
Hide Titles: Hide Cell Titles Hide Icons: Hide Cell Icons Cinema Mode: Preferences Dark Mode

Hide Flash Button: Remove Flash Icon/Button Hide HDR Button: Remove HDR Icon/Flash Hide Iris Button: Remove Iris Icon/Button Hide Timer Button: Remove Timer Icon/Button Hide Flip Button: Remove Flip Icon/Button
Hide Preview Button: Remove Photo Preview
Hide Dark Bars: Remove AirPlay and Brightness Dark Bar Enable Rounded Corners: Enable iOS 10 Style Corners

Hide Date Label: Remove Date/Time Label Hide Edit Button: Remove Edit Button Hide NC Segments: Hide NC Top Segments Hide NC Today Footer: Hide Edit Button Background Date Label Black/White: Change Date From White to Black
